item.title: Miss Florida takes National Watermelon Association Queen crown
item.description: SAVANNAH, Ga. – A convention celebrating milestones – the 100th anniversary of the National Watermelon Association and 50 years of the watermelon queen program – culminated in Brandi Harrison’s crowning as 2014 NWA Queen Feb. 22.

item.title: USDA affirms need to fight citrus greening to Florida growers
item.description: LAKELAND, Fla. — Florida citrus growers received additional support in the fight to save their industry from citrus greening from the top U.S. Department of Agriculture official leading the battle.

item.title: TV show features Mann sweet potato fries
item.description: The broadcast debut of a “Food Factory” segment on Mann Packing Co.’s sweet potato crinkle cut fries was set for Feb. 21.

item.title: North American potato production down in 2013
item.description: Fall potato production in the U.S. and Canada fell 3% from 2012 to 2013.

item.title: Federal indictment says ND potato growers ‘spoiled’ their crop
item.description: Two potato-growing brothers in North Dakota are facing federal conspiracy charges for allegedly using Rid-X and portable heaters to spoil their stored potatoes, for which they received almost $840,000 in crop insurance and disaster payments.

item.title: Unified Grocers presents award to Northgate González Markets
item.description: Northgate González Markets, Anaheim, Calif., received the 2014 Ben Schwartz Retail Grocery Visionary Award from Unified Grocers at an awards dinner at Tamayo Restaurant in Los Angeles.

item.title: Washington State potato growers meet with state legislators
item.description: Potato growers throughout Washington State visited the state’s capitol in Olympia the week of Feb. 17 for Potato Day.

item.title: Bolthouse Farms ogles Food Porn in new website
item.description: Bolthouse Farms has introduced a website, FoodPornIndex.com, that tracks Twitter and Internet hashtags mentioning a dozen fruits and vegetables — and just as many snacks that are high in fat, sugar or salt.

item.title: Mango Board seeks nominees
item.description: The National Mango Board is seeking nominees to become board members.

item.title: Directions to Sesame Street coming soon
item.description: March 31 is the target date when the industry will know how marketers can use Sesame Street characters to promote fruits and vegetables.
